Reviews.Title: great  tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Emil Schultz
Reviews.Content: We were very reluctant to buy this tv as there was only one review with not the best rating.We have had other panasonic products with good results so decided to give it a try from a retail store so we could take it right back if we didn't like it.The picture is excellent-I Changed a couple of the settings to my likeing & its just as clear as our more expensive larger screen. I like that you can view it pretty good from any angle.It was very easy to set up.We don't use it for video games or anything like that so can't say how it works for that.I would recommend this tv--nice exterior & good picture & easy to use--I don't need anything else.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic VIERA TC-L32C5 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD TV
Reviews.Author: John P. Eperjesi
Reviews.Content: I'm a fan of Panasonic TV's and equipment.  This TV is replacing a TV I purchased in 1987.  I hope to get at least half of that life time with this one.  Delivered in less than a week and in perfect condition.  The price was considerably less than local retailers and with the free shipping and no sales tax made for an exceptional value.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: napa244 "napa244"
Reviews.Content: This television has a great picture.  I took off one star because it has no output for video.  I wanted to run the cable connection through  the dvd player and was not able to do so.  The other reason is because the directions and placement of the regular red, white and yellow input were unusual.  The red and white are normal, but the yellow does not go above them, but in the top output across.(The "x's" represent the input connections)X  < X  yellow on leftX  >  X  white - on rightX  >  X  red  - on rightIt has more features and better volume than a Toshiba of comparable size and price. It is also less expensive than Samsung or LG.  I'm using it in the bedroom and it fits the bill perfectly.  It is a little thicker than some televisions (as another review noted), but not enough to bother me.  I'm looking at the picture, not the frame.All in all, a good value.

Reviews.Title: I love Panasonic electronics Go Go Go
Reviews.Author: Verjo
Reviews.Content: This TV is being used right now to edit my old movies and it is really making it easy, it is crystal clear. It is a nice size to see everything and doesn't take up too much space.Thank you PanasonicVerjo

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Linda W.
Reviews.Content: We had a little trouble attaching the base because of the way the screw holes are recessed; but once assembled, it was easy to configure and connect to our TiVo. It's important to me to buy Energy Star certified items whenever they're available, and this TV uses less energy without sacrificing picture or sound quality. Combined with Amazon's pricing and free shipping, it's a great value!

Reviews.Title: a very good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: underdoggy "underdog"
Reviews.Content: this panasonic tv has a very good picture with plenty of adjustments to make for different types of viewing. the item shipped very quick and looks very good this panasonic tvs is a very good lower priced panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: CAmeo
Reviews.Content: We've had ours for 3 years and haven't had any problem.  Picture quality is great and often better than more expensive options.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Heath Johnson "n2johnson"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my grandmother.  Fits very nicely in her bedroom on top of the dresser. Set up was a snap for me and the set up process on the TV was simple to follow.  Good little TV for the money.  Panasonic makes a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Fishing "Harv"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, good picture even without HD.  Amazon had a great price.  What more could you ask.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: retired person "Meyer"
Reviews.Content: This tv has a great picture and great sound; it was easy to set up and is light weight. I am enjoying it very much.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Robert Chatman
Reviews.Content: This is truly a quality product at a great price. A wonderful purchase! I would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cannot play video from USB
Reviews.Author: Aaron Demner "FungusTrooper"
Reviews.Content: This is a very solid TV, and for the price I paid on black friday it is great. The only major gripe I have is that the product description, when I purchased it, gave the impression that this TV can play videos via USB. This is not true on this specific model. It can play music and show photos from USB, but not play video.Other than that, it works great. I use it for my PS3 and Wii, and it plays both fine, including the PS3's Blu-Ray player. No tearing etc, as far as my merely human eyes can see.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Mohler
Reviews.Content: turned out to be a 1080i TV. As a TV repairman I know that the Panasonic LCD is tough as nails.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: High Tech Redneck "Bob"
Reviews.Content: I have had this for about 1 month now,was a little skeptical after reading some of the reviews.but said what the@#$ its just for football on the back deck and my other plasma Panasonic has not let me down in 4 years.works great right out of the box, not sure what all the negative reviews are about,if this thing last as long as my other panyI will be more than happy

Reviews.Title: Not that great of a TV you can do a lot better
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Got this TV last year on Black Friday and the quality of the picture was below fair.  Hooked it up to my computer, and it was blury not very crisp at all.  My Sony tube television looked 2x better than this.

Reviews.Title: Expected more
Reviews.Author: Sheldog "jazzman"
Reviews.Content: after one year of little use (bedroom TV) the picture is bland and washed out.  Lacks detail.  Input signal is HD cable.  I am not pleased with the performance of the TV and expected better from Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Great Service & Product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Delivered as promised, Panasonic comes through as the best again.  TV set up was simple and fast. I would suggest this TV to everyone.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: drummers girl "Helen K"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the bedroom. The picture is very good and we are happy with this purchase. The sound was fine for my old ears.

Reviews.Title: panasonic tv
Reviews.Author: ismael14noth cali
Reviews.Content: Awesome for price and the tv its lovely, to setup was very very easy so now a really love this tv

Reviews.Title: tv L32C5
Reviews.Author: Bryan W. Bailey
Reviews.Content: This is the second of the Pana Viera tvs that I've purchased and each is an easy set up and then works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Panasonc TC-L32C5 is a terrible TV
Reviews.Author: Lawngal2
Reviews.Content: Panasonic TC-L32C5 is a terrible TV. I have only had it a few months. It now turns on and off by itself several times a day. Customer Service told me to reset it to factory setting. I did this but that did not remedy the problem. I am very disapppointed in this panasonic television.

Reviews.Title: panasonic 32in lcd hdtv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "moko"
Reviews.Content: I own this lcd hdtv but i have not been able to find out if it supports audio return channel (arc). Can someone tell me, please?I find colors on this tv look pretty natural when watching over-the-air hd shows, not as bright as in the same size sony lcd tv but pleasant nonetheless. But blu ray discs look as good as in the sony.I take off one star because it doesnt have an audio output. The speakers are ok.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: J. Wollens
Reviews.Content: The colors are washed out no matter how we adjust the settings.  We got this as a Black Friday deal if I remember right, even though we didn't really want a cheap one.  It works, but we aren't happy at all with the picture quality compared with our other Flat LCD TVs.  Do yourself a favor and spend an extra $100+ and get 1080p and a higher quality model that you will be happy with.  Even if you have to wait a few more months to save the extra money it will be worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Teresa V Hite
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my daughter.She is disabled and finds it easy to operate and clear picture.Would buy another

Reviews.Title: Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Bryon
Reviews.Content: I own two of these, both used for computer monitors.  Simple to toggle between my Dell laptop dock and my desktop PC.

Reviews.Title: yup
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: this television is great at first i thought it was having some sort of lag on the picture of the screen but eventually i figured out that it was my cable company. this tv is great thank you

Reviews.Title: Really like it!
Reviews.Content: Very good value and I am happy with the all around quality. Shipping was fast, set up was easy, picture quality is great. I won't give it five stars until the warranty period is up but our Panasonic 42 1080 has done just fine.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Lee E. Frey
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my daughter and son in law. They are very pleased and replaced an old set.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture - Good Price
Reviews.Author: dmcoopknx
Reviews.Content: I boought 20 of these TVs and so far they are all working really well. They have a decent picture and are easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment
Reviews.Author: TROY D. JEFFERY
Reviews.Content: I was on the market looking for a tv for at least 2 years, before I decided to purchase this model.  It had all the bells and whistles I was looking for.  Nice size screen, several usb connections, built in nexflix, amazon, fox sports, pandora, etc.Also I just couldn't see myself buying nothing but a panasonic tv, due to the great colors and high resolution.  Currently using in the guest bedroom, and it looks great.  For the price and size, this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with this
Reviews.Author: BenDGen "Hebrews 12:2 (in the Bible)"
Reviews.Content: It's been a while since we had a TV this big in the house, but the viewing angles are great.  The picture is bright and clear (for 720p).  The sound is a little quiet, but if you crank it up, the quality is still good.  Our computer and Wii are plugged into this and both look great.  Icons and text come out clear on the computer and the Wii looks great even though it's output is only 420p.  As far as I can tell, the only audio output is digital.  I use Logitech 5.1 computer speaker system, so I'm going to have to buy a converter to translate the digital signal into analog, but we can get something for around $20 (on Amazon) that will work for our purposes.  No big deal.  I bought it over Black Friday weekend of 2012, it I feel like I got one of this year's best Black Friday bargains.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Keith OH/MI
Reviews.Content: I hung this TV from the celing in my basement for my exercise room.  It has a nice picture and is a very good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - Great Picture!
Reviews.Author: R. Cooper "Coop"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for $189, no tax, free shipping from Amazon as a Christmas present for my son and daughter-in-law. It arrived in perfect condition and on time. The set has a great picture. They own a 26" Panasonic lcd set which has held up great over time. I avoid the Chinese manufacturers when it comes to TVs. I'll stay with Panasonic everytime.

Reviews.Title: Great performance and value
Reviews.Author: D. R. M. "wicmar"
Reviews.Content: We've had this Panasonic for a year now and just love it. Our first flatscreen. It shows a sharp, clear, colorful picture--so long as you feed it good material. A well made DVD looks nearly as good as a blu ray on this screen. Of course, if the DVD is not well mastered, the Panasonic can't do anything about that. Now a blu ray on this set, well, it'll blow you away. I know they say there's no point in using blu rays on a set this small (still the biggest set we've ever owned), but I think they look terrific. Also, the sound from the Panasonic is more than enough for most shows. I only fire up the audio system it's connected to for blockbusters and such. If you're looking for something smallish in a flatscreen, with great quality and decent price, look no further.

Reviews.Title: great television
Reviews.Author: David Nyren
Reviews.Content: this is the second purchase of this TV that I have made, it has a great picture and the sound is excellent. Perfect television for a bedroom or small living room space. I would strongly recommend this TV to anyone who would ask. I bought it at a great price from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Chiriboga "Dats it!"
Reviews.Content: For the US dollar is getting weaker and weaker, but here, it made a HUGE bang.The reception was 720, as promised, the weight, low, and the simplicity to connect and set up, so pleasing, Even I could do it.I recommend for those people whose T.V is on the fritz.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mary D
Reviews.Content: I bought this LCD TV. It is a cheap and wonderful item. I totally recommend it; if u have the chance to buy it, do it

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the dollars
Reviews.Author: Reverend
Reviews.Content: This misses 5 out of 5 because it isn't a high performer and struggles with some daily viewing.  With that said it is perfect for a 720p at this price point.  I would recommend it to anyone considering it.  This is a TV used in an office.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: hondais1
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my mom for Christmas. It was a great price and was delivered quickly. Hooked it up for her and it has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my son for Chistmas and got it in 2 days.  Great picture and very affordable  Can't go wrong with a Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: Excellent unit
Reviews.Author: L B Thomas
Reviews.Content: Already had almost identical unit and it is everything I want.Good sound; good picture.I like sleep function on menu.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: Finally broke down to replace the old model, and we are loving this flat screen.  The picture quality is great, and it is the perfect size for the room it is in.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: John M. Harrell
Reviews.Content: this replaced an older model in my bedroom. tv works great. awesome sound and good picture. my only complaint is that direct tv's remote does work 100% but that is a direct tv issue not a tv problem. would buy this again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: TV IS AWESOME !!!!
Reviews.Author: LINDA
Reviews.Content: I bought this Panasonic HD TV to complete my Home Theatre in my family room. After setting up ' NEW ' Tower Speakers just last week I checked out the Amazon price for this particular TV , it arrived a day early and was handed to me personally by the UPS Driver. That night I assembled the stand it rests on myself ( a piece of cake ) the next day my Cable Company came to my home hooked up the TV, performed the SET - UP COMPLETE & gave me a HD DVR CABLE BOX, excellent all the way around.  As for the TV itself > ' SIMPLY AWESOME ' the sound is out of this world and the PQ is AMAZING. I'M THRILLED !  Panasonic makes high performance products. I have this NEW one in the family room & another Panasonic Flat Screen which I purchased last year a 40 inch for my bedroom. I can't get over  the top - notch quality this 32 inch one is for the PRICE ! Linda in New Jersey ( Jersey Shore area ) ~

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Phone Bill
Reviews.Content: Got this as a second tv to go in an exercise room.  Set up was very easy, the unit is very light  weight, and it was easy to hang on the wall. The picture quality is very good. It has decent quality sound. The only possible down side to this TV could be that there are not very many inputs and outputs. It has 2 HDMI inputs, which perfectly meets our needs. Glad I bought it, I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Pic
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Klages "denure"
Reviews.Content: We received this item for our bedroom.  We have found the quality of the picture is very clear.  It doesn't compare to our 2080 in the great room.  Great size and weight.

Reviews.Title: Finally a TV I can see easy
Reviews.Author: zakman
Reviews.Content: After watching a 22' flat panel for a few years this was a very nice change.  Only bad part was tv base broke

Reviews.Title: Fact's
Reviews.Author: old dude
Reviews.Content: Frame size is 14 " x 29 " Screen is 15 " x 27.5 " When veiwing wide screen movies it is 12 " x 27 ".Manual controls are on the left side edge of screen so can be used when wall mounted.Power cord is lower rear centered.Inputs / Outputs are left rear of screen - 2 standard jacks, 2 HDMI, computer, phone, & network 1 each and of coaurse antenna.I purchased this as a gift for my sister and as far as she is concerned it is as clear & sharpe as her sons 60" 3 - D set of another brand.

Reviews.Title: great TV, son loves it.
Reviews.Author: consult78650 "consult78650"
Reviews.Content: put this tv on the wall for my 12 yo, he hooked his xbox up to it right away, loves it and it has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good LCD!
Reviews.Author: DJIA305
Reviews.Content: Simply put, this lcd tv gives me a great value, especially for the price I paid ($189, Amazon's Black Friday week lightning deal). In my house I have a 47" 1080p LG 3D LED tv (less than $1100 when it came out last year, thanks Amazon), a then $4,000 37" 1080i LG lcd tv (yeah, they were THAT expensive when they first came out), a 23" LG 720p lcd tv in my guest room, and now this puppy in my garage. Where does it stand as far as quality goes?I feel it rivals my 37" LG! I can watch it very comfortably, heck we caught the Pacquiao/Marquez PPV fights, numerous other boxing and football matches. The tv looks fantastic, albeit with only a few quirks. On the Movie setting, some colors really stand out, mainly the reds, which seem to almost glow. I highly doubt most will notice this, but since I have those higher quality hdtvs, I really notice it. Still, it isn't to the point of annoyance. I could see where only having two hdmi inputs would annoy some, but after all, 2 is the current standard to budget tvs. One can easily remedy this by purchasing an hdmi splitter, as I have (you will see it once I upload my pic, it was a cheap one on Amazon, works fine). I have my U-Verse box and AppleTV 2nd gen connected to the splitter and into the 1st hdmi connection on the tv, so I technically can add 2 more inputs if needed. I also dislike the shiny frame, as one can see reflections which are rather distracting at times.All in all, I highly recommend this tv, especially if you can get a close deal to what I paid. I wouldn't want to pay more than $250-$260 for this, as for a few bucks more you can get something better. I'll load my pic onto the user submitted pics, between this 32" Panasonic I got on an Amazon Black Friday week lightning deal, a Convenience Concepts 131020 3-tier stand I got on sale for less than $35 from here, and a refurbished Vizio soundbar also purchased through Amazon (Tiger Direct), I have an amazing system set up in my garage for under $250 that rivals most people's living room entertainment systems! Thanks, Amazon!!!Comment

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Wow
Reviews.Author: JoeDenver
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Panasonic TV and I am surprised and not surprised after all its a Panasonic.  I unboxed it and set it up in like 5 minutes and just stood there amazed with the quality of the color and clarity of the picture. I read the reviews here on Amazon and I hoped it would be as nice as reviews indicated and it is.  I saw a review on Cnet and quite frankly I'm not sure what they were talking about this is a great TV with just enough features for what you would expect at this price point. Hard to tell its not 1080p.  I highly recommend this TV for any room where a 32"  is the right size.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Harlenys Arrieta
Reviews.Content: It's a great TV, has a very definite picture and surround sound that makes you feel in a movie theater.It is a product that I highly recommend and am very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: OK tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Larry Freeze
Reviews.Content: So so TV.  I do have buyer remorse.  I would not buy this TV had I seen the quality of the pic first.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed by FALSE ADVERTISING!
Reviews.Author: Ruel
Reviews.Content: I bought this item since the product description said it played videos, it doesnt! The model # I received coincides with one above however it doesnt play videos, just reads pics and mp3!! Unfortunately, I can't return. I'm very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: So much better than I ever expected
Reviews.Author: R. T. Swisher
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my 86 year old mother that needs simple to operate. I was shocked how good the picture and sound really was straight out of the box.I wish I had bought 2 of them. I wanted to buy another one today but the price went up $60 in a week.I'm going to look around for another 1.

Reviews.Title: Not the Cheapest Bargain TV, but a Safe Bet.
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Search for 32" 720p TVs on amazon or anywhere on the web. There is a bunch of them ranging from around $200 to up to over $400. This one price wise sits right in the middle, so we would expect it to be average in the bunch so I will grade it as such. Every bargain TV has similar picture quality so don't waste time trying to find an advantage there. Things that will change are TV depth, connection, extra hardware/software, and how pretty/ugly it looks from the front.The TV depth is pretty thick on this one, but you would be hard pressed to find a TV in the range that is not. Westinghouse does make a 32" thinner TV at around 2' think that sells for sub $300, but I can not recommend a Westinghouse TV due my experiences with there bad quality. That being said this TV falls as we expect with a average size and therefore passes.The connection on this TV do not really disappoint me personally. I know people like to run everything with HDMI these days, but I couldn't honestly desire to hook up more that one maybe two devices to this TV. I see this device TV as useful in like a kids room, home gym, sports bar, etc. I would think this would be a good centerpiece for a living room with your bluray player, surround sound, PS3 and Wii connected to it. If that is what you want then look else where as this TV will not work for that. I do consider its connectivity average, although I know some other budget TVs were nice enough to throw a 3 HDMI on there enormous backsides.This TV, in my opinion does succeed in its availability of extra hardware/software. It does have the somewhat helpful game mode if that is your intended use. It also has a more usable usb than most budget TVs and does a good job of receiving photos, videos and music. It also has many eco features, but these I find less appealing. The worst is the auto dimming, which may save you $5 bucks a year, but is annoying. On expensive TVs these auto dimming features can work mostly unnoticed, but with these budget TV it seems to jump down or up in brightness and you find yourself adjusting your eyes to the new screen light. This can of course be turned off which I would recommend.  Overall above average here.This TV is not as attractive looking as you would expect a big brand to be. The budget Samsung and LG TVs look pretty decent in my opinion, but this one missed out. As the TV unit is visible whenever it is on or off I find this fact kind of disappointing.Overall why three stars? This TV is fine by all means, and a great price if you want a safer brand name budget TV. I don't know if you would want to spend the extra $50-100 to get a thinner better looking TV, but you may want to consider it for long term satisfaction. My personal preference, and the one I took was to spend almost $100 less and get a equally bulky and ugly budget TV from a less known brand. The savings there was why I can not give this average performing TV four stars.Cons over previous L32C3 model:Less speaker powerLarger BezelNo IPS panelPro over previous L32C3 modle:It is cheaper to make and therefore cheaper to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Viewing size of picture difficult to adjust !
Reviews.Author: Factation
Reviews.Content: Quality of picture for viewing, good. Sound just OK. Problem is trying to adjust screen size so that all words fit within screen size selected. Frustrating and not acceptable, nor enjoyable! Probably worth the $.

Reviews.Title: Had it for a week - taking it back
Reviews.Author: Karl
Reviews.Content: Pretty shoddy TV.  The base is flimsy and must be screwed on to the TV.  The remote's loaded with buttons and not backlit. The blacks are quite poor and the screen only seems bright when directly facing the front of the TV.  Only 2 HDMI ports (this wasn't an issue for us but some may be upset). Worst of all, the speakers are extremely weak.  Not worth even the $250 we paid for it.Update (11/20/12): I took it back and dropped another $40 for a better TV - Vizio E320i-A0.  There's no reason to suffer for 6-7 years with a bedroom TV that has color and sound this bad.Update (11/27/12): No amount of video or sound adjustments would resolve the poor picture quality and sound quality on this TV.  Not sure why people are so eager to defend this TV but it's just not good compared to the competition.

Reviews.Title: Not good...
Reviews.Author: Chicchi
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a few weeks.  It shuts off out of the blue.. I would like to return it but I am too lazy so will keep it... And Panasonic customer support is not helpful.

ProductInfo.Features:
720p LCD
USB Player
2 HDMI 1 USB 1 PC Input
TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 30.7-Inch x 10.5-Inch x 4.3-Inch, TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 30.7-Inch x 21.5-Inch x 9.9-Inch
Receiving System: ATSC/QAM/NTSC
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic VIERA TC-L32C5 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD TV (2012 Model)
